metadata.name: Production Performance LP1
metadata.description:
Production Performance LP1 J.ISOLINI.mp4 - 25.2mb
Dimensions: 540x540
Codecs: H.264
Duration: 00:40

Artist: Jason Isolini

IRL Exhibition: "Out of Office" at Public Works Administration

Jason Isolini is a Brooklyn based net-artist and new-media sculptor. He received his BFA from the School of Visual Arts, and holds an MFA from the Art Institute of Chicago. His work has been exhibited in solo and group exhibitions including: Out of Office, PWA, New York City (2022); The Terminal Human Shaped Whole, Anonymous Gallery, New York CIty (2021); The FiDi Arsenale, New York City (2020); Well Now WTF, Silicon Valet, online (2020); TechnoMEME 2, Fuse Factory, Ohio; Perma Falling, 77 Mulberry, New York City (2019); Terms and Conditions Apply, Annka Kultys Gallery, London (2018); and Permeable Boundaries, Plexus Projects, New York City (2018). Intervening within Google Maps, he has created large-scale public art installations that comment upon our new digital commons.
